column1: Shut up! I hate you! I hate you!
I have an ear infection. What are you seeing the doctor for?
Oh, not much, just hanging around-
We sometimes sneak out during recess and a friend named _________ goes and gets her cats, and we'll just cheese all day long.
You lied to me, Mother. You said it was the real Mr. Hankey.
I will not forget this, Mother. I will not forget this, ever.
I want a horse. I want a big brown horse with a brown-and-black tail, and a diamond tiara-  Ah!
Is that so, you smelly little bastard?!
This way, you pathetic squirt of vaginal discharge!  This way, you beef-witted shriveled-up monkey's penis.  Up here, you gamy mass of baby vomit!  In here.
I'm not going in there, you stupid puddle of a homeless man urine!
I don't wanna to go to hell.
I want Ike to be president!
Look at the little black lion, Mommy.
Is this the South Park Crime Unit?
If I knew where it was, it wouldn't be lost.
